description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical

two different quantities of juice were transferred or presented (no-transfer trials) from a pair of identical clear cups into a single cup and a set of 4 cups or 8 cups  from the beginning of the trials - no_testing_trial / no-transfer-4-cup / no-transfer-8-cup / 4-cup  / 8-cup

ls_trial = in half of the trials  the larger quantity was poured into the single cup and the smaller quantity into the set of multiple cups.  / lm_trial = in the other half of the trials  the larger quantity was poured into the set of multiple cups and the smaller quantity into the single cup.
amount of juice chosen in the 1st choice which was to confirm that the apes were motivated to select the larger quantity - larger_quantity
amount of juice chosen in the 2nd choice – no_testing_trial (no values)l / larger_quantity (28ml) / smaller_quantity (14ml)
type of container chosen in the 1st choice - single cup / multiple cups
type of container chosen in the 2nd choice – no_testing_trial/ single cup / multiple cups
